name: GunDuck
description:
In this game you are a miniature duck with a gun.

This is my first game finished at this level and I'm really proud of myself.

It's not much of a thing but I managed to create this for about 24 hours. I started at 10PM at Saturday.

It's really buggy, please have in mind that this is still in active development.

All of the assets were custom hand-crafted just for you.

There is no sound nor bg music.

I didn't add any GWJ wildcards to the title screen, because I had no time left.

For the next jam I guess I will be a bit more prepared.

Sorry for the texts, I just rushed a lot of things in the last 10 minutes.

A PROTIP: There are 4 guns in total - a pistol, an uzi, a sniper riffle and a shotgun. They will be dropped after clearing some waves.

As @wren noted, for the best experience, please play in fullscreen.

I used warm32 palette.

Inspired by de_rats map from Counter-Strike 1.6, Monster in my pocket (nes game), and Maple Story.

ENJOY
